name: Setka
description:
Setka is a classic, old game. It helps a lot of people to concentrate themselves!

Rules are easy. You must only click numbers from the lowest to the highest! Be fast, cuz game counts your reaction time! Your the lowest time is saves in Achivements page.

Game for the time being includes 3 modes:

  • 5x5 (25 blocks)
  • 6x6 (36 blocks)
  • 7x7 (49 blocks)

More modes upcoming!

Have a nice game!

Game is in early access. If you can, report bugs in comments. I gonna fix it!

Current version:  BETA 1.4

It works only in android!

Game is compeletelly free, but if you like it, you can leave a small tip. I will be very grateful 😉
